# LABAS Medical Institutions Dashboard — User Guide
## Version 1.4 — Last Updated: April 2025  
Guide By: Eng. Marwa Cheema

---

## 1. Introduction
Welcome to the **LABAS Medical Institutions Dashboard** — a user‑friendly platform designed to streamline daily healthcare operations.

The dashboard provides a centralized environment for managing:
- Appointments
- Booking requests
- Doctor profiles
- Imaging services
- Timetables and schedules

This guide walks you through each feature to help you use the system efficiently.

---

## 2. Login & Access
To access the LABAS dashboard:
1. Visit: https://org.labas.ly/login
2. Enter your username and password.
3. Click **Login** to access your dashboard.

If you face login issues, contact the support team.

---

## 3. Dashboard Overview
Once logged in, you will see the main sections:

### • Dashboard
Overview of key tasks, statistics, and upcoming appointments.

### • New Appointment
Create new appointments with full patient and booking details.

### • Appointment Calendar
A calendar view of all scheduled appointments with filtering and editing options.

### • Bookings
Manage incoming booking requests (approve, reschedule, or cancel).

### • Booking Information
Contains three major components:
- **Doctor Profile**
- **Group (Team)**
- **Imaging Services**

### • All Schedules — Timetable
Manage the schedules of doctors, groups, and imaging services.

---

## 4. Features & Usage

### 4.1 New Appointment
To create an appointment:
1. Click **New Appointment**.
2. Select the patient type.
3. Enter patient information.
4. Choose the booking type.
5. Fill in booking details.
6. Click **Save**.

---

### 4.2 Appointment Calendar
The calendar allows you to:
- View all appointments in a clean calendar layout
- Filter by booking type or date range
- Click any appointment to view or edit details

---

### 4.3 Bookings
This section allows full management of booking requests:
- View all incoming patient bookings
- Approve, reschedule, or cancel requests
- Filter by customer name, date, or status

---

## 4.4 Booking Information
A detailed module containing key operational tools.

### 4.4.1 Doctor Profile
Displays:
- Doctor name
- Specialization
- Degree
- Consulting price

#### 4.4.1.1 Adding a New Doctor Profile
Steps:
1. Click **New Doctor Profile**.
2. Select the doctor from the database (if available).
3. Choose specialization.
4. Select degree.
5. Enter consulting price (0 for public doctors).
6. Click **Create**.

> **Note:** The doctor profile will not appear in the app until the Super Admin approves the price.

---

### 4.4.2 Group (Team)
A group of doctors assigned to a specific day, helping patients book by availability rather than individual doctors.

#### 4.4.2.1 Adding a New Group
1. Enter group name.
2. Select specialization.
3. Provide a brief description.
4. Set consulting price (if private).

> **Note:** The group information must be provided in both Arabic and English.

---

### 4.4.3 Imaging Services
Patients request imaging services; the institution confirms and the call center delivers results through the app.

#### 4.4.3.1 Adding a New Imaging Service
1. Click **New Image Analysis**.
2. Select a service category.
3. Select the specific service.
4. Enable **Require Attachment** if needed.
5. Enter a detailed description.
6. Set the price.
7. Click **Create**.

---

## 4.5 All Schedules — Timetable
Used to manage doctor and service availability.

### You can:
- View full schedules, shifts, and availability
- Edit schedules based on doctor or group availability

### 4.5.1 Editing a Timetable
1. The **Schedulable Type** section (Doctor / Group / Imaging) appears automatically — **do not modify it**.
2. Update the following:
   - Start time
   - End time
   - Days of the week
   - Capacity (number of sessions)
   - Booking window (how far in advance booking is allowed)
3. Ensure the timetable is set to **Active**.
4. Click **Save**.

---

## 5. Common Issues & Troubleshooting

| Issue | Solution |
|-------|----------|
| Cannot log in | Check credentials or contact LABAS support |
| Appointment not saving | Ensure all fields are filled logically and correctly |
| Missing customer data | Refresh the page or contact support |

---

## 6. Contact Support
If you need help, you can reach the LABAS support team:
- **Email:** support@labas.com
- **Phone:** +218 91‑4285424
- **Live Chat:** Available 24/7 inside the LABAS app

---

## 7. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
### • How do I log in?
Visit the login page, enter your credentials, and click **Login**.

### • I forgot my password — what should I do?
Contact the LABAS support team.

### • How do I create a new appointment?
Go to **New Appointment**, fill in all details, then save.

### • Can I view appointments in a calendar?
Yes — the appointment calendar provides filtering and editing tools.

### • Why isn't my doctor/group/service appearing in the app?
Check that:
- The record is **Active**
- It has been approved by the **Super Admin**, if required
